title: Bluetooth connectivity/4a
content:
Trying to connect a fresh-out-the-box 4a to a MacBook Air...and a pair of bluetooth speakers - both previously connected without probs to a Samsung S6.
Problem is that the 4a and the MBook/Speakers can 'see' each other - but they just don't connect. Or in the case of the MBook, a connection is made briefly, but then drops off in 2-3 seconds. The speakers are showing  as connected devices on the 4a...but no sound is coming thru.
Have tried all the suggested fixes as far as I'm able with what's a new and unfamiliar phone, but nothing's working. 
An suggestions ?
